00052 void pizGrowingArrayRemoveIndex (PIZGrowingArray *array, long index)
00053 {
00054     if (index >= 0 && index < array->index) {
00055         long i;
00056         
00057         for (i = index; i < (array->index - 1); i++) {
00058             array->values[i] = array->values[i + 1];
00059         }
00060         
00061         array->index --;
00062     }
00063 }
00064 
00065 PIZError pizGrowingArrayRemoveLastValue (PIZGrowingArray *x)
00066 {
00067     long err = PIZ_ERROR;
00068     
00069     if (x->index) {
00070         x->index --;
00071         err = PIZ_GOOD;
00072     }
00073         
00074     return err;
00075 }
00076 
00077 long pizGrowingArrayFirstIndexOfValue (const PIZGrowingArray *x, long value)
00078 {
00079     long i;
00080     long k = -1;
00081     
00082     for (i = 0; i < x->index; i++) {
00083         if (x->values[i] == value) {
00084             k = i;
00085             break;
00086         }
00087     }
00088     
00089     return k;
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool pizGrowingArrayContainsValue (const PIZGrowingArray *x, long value)
00093 {
00094     long i;
00095     long k = false;
00096     
00097     for (i = 0; i < x->index; i++) {
00098         if (x->values[i] == value) {
00099             k = true;
00100             break;
00101         }
00102     }
00103         
00104     return k;
00105 }
00106 
00107 PIZError pizGrowingArrayCopy (PIZGrowingArray *x, const PIZGrowingArray *toCopy)
00108 {
00109     PIZError err = PIZ_GOOD;
00110     
00111     if (toCopy->index > x->size) {
00112         long *newValues = NULL;
00113         
00114         if (newValues = (long *)realloc (x->values, toCopy->size * sizeof(long))) {
00115             x->size = toCopy->size;
00116             x->values = newValues;
00117         } else {
00118             err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00119         }
00120     }
00121     
00122     if (!err)  {
00123         long i;
00124         
00125         for (i = 0; i < toCopy->index; i++) {
00126             x->values[i] = toCopy->values[i];
00127         }
00128             
00129         x->index = toCopy->index;
00130     }
00131     
00132     return err;
00133 }
00134 
00135 PIZError pizGrowingArrayAppendArray (PIZGrowingArray *x, const PIZGrowingArray *toAppend)
00136 {
00137     PIZError err = PIZ_GOOD;
00138     
00139     if ((toAppend->index + x->index) > x->size) {
00140         long *newValues = NULL;
00141         long newSize = toAppend->size + x->size;
00142 
00143         if (newValues = (long *)realloc (x->values, newSize * sizeof(long))) {
00144             x->size = newSize;
00145             x->values = newValues;
00146         } else {
00147             err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00148         }
00149     }
00150     
00151     if (!err)  {
00152         long i;
00153     
00154         for (i = 0; i < toAppend->index; i++) {
00155             x->values[x->index + i] = toAppend->values[i];
00156         }
00157         
00158         x->index += toAppend->index;
00159     }
00160     
00161     return err;
00162 }
00163 
00164 PIZError pizGrowingArrayAppendPtr (PIZGrowingArray *x, long argc, long *argv)
00165 {
00166     PIZError err = PIZ_GOOD;
00167     
00168     if ((argc + x->index) > x->size) {
00169         long *newValues = NULL;
00170         long newSize = x->size * 2;
00171         
00172         while (newSize < (argc + x->index)) {
00173             newSize = newSize * 2;
00174         }
00175 
00176         if (newValues = (long *)realloc (x->values, newSize * sizeof(long))) {
00177             x->size = newSize;
00178             x->values = newValues;
00179         } else {
00180             err = PIZ_MEMORY;
00181         }
00182     }
00183     
00184     if (!err) {
00185         long i;
00186         
00187         for (i = 0; i < argc; i++) {
00188             x->values[x->index + i] = argv[i];
00189         }
00190             
00191         x->index += argc;
00192     }
00193     
00194     return err;
00195 }
